almost.functional.reactive

Interface Observer<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type being observed.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BroadcastObserver

    public interface Observer<T>
    An Observer implementation that observes data, errors, and the completion of what is being observed. Once the Observer is completed no further observations of any type should be handled.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void completed(java.lang.Boolean withoutError)
      Observe the completion.
      void error(java.lang.Throwable error)
      Observe an error that occurred.
      void next(T value)
      Observe each data item made available.

    • Method Detail

      • completed

        void completed(java.lang.Boolean withoutError)
        Observe the completion.
        Parameters:
        withoutError - if completed without error.

      • next

        void next(T value)
        Observe each data item made available.
        Parameters:
        value - a data item.

      • error

        void error(java.lang.Throwable error)
        Observe an error that occurred. This allows for exceptions without stopping the observations.
        Parameters:
        error - the throwable.
